components.name: App
EmailInput
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  class="email-input"
  appearance="outline">
  <mat-label>Email</mat-label>
  <input
    matInput
    type="email"
    placeholder="Email"
    class="email-input__input"
    [formControl]="emailControl"
    [errorStateMatcher]="errorStateMatcher">
  @if (isEmailInvalid()) {
    <mat-error>Email is not valid.</mat-error>
  }
  @if (isEmailEmpty()) {
    <mat-error>Email is not entered.</mat-error>
  }
</mat-form-field>

components.name: LoginForm
components.templateData: Login

components.name: LoginFormActions
components.templateData:
<mat-card-actions class="form-actions">
  <button
    class="form-actions__login"
    matButton="filled"
    (click)="login()">
    Login
  </button>
  <button
    class="form-actions__register"
    matButton
    disabled
    (click)="register()">
    Register
  </button>
</mat-card-actions>

components.name: PasswordInput
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  class="password-input"
  appearance="outline">
  <mat-label>Password</mat-label>
  <input
    matInput
    placeholder="Password"
    class="password-input__input"
    [type]="getPasswordInputType()"
    [formControl]="passwordControl"
    [errorStateMatcher]="errorStateMatcher">
  <button
    matIconButton
    matSuffix
    [type]="getPasswordInputType()"
    [attr.aria-label]="'Hide password'"
    [attr.aria-pressed]="hidePassword()"
    (click)="togglePasswordVisibility($event)">
    <mat-icon>{{ getPasswordVisibilityIconName() }}</mat-icon>
  </button>
  @if (isPasswordInvalid()) {
    <mat-error>Password is not valid.</mat-error>
  }
  @if (isPasswordEmpty()) {
    <mat-error>Password is not entered.</mat-error>
  }
</mat-form-field>

reqHandler
variables.rawdescription: Request handler used by the Angular CLI (for dev-server and during build) or Firebase Cloud Functions.
